main.name: S3aB
main.description: I am a web developer and coder extrodinare. I use my diverse skill set to overcome challenges presented by the unique projects I complete
main.bio: I started my software development career in C++, but later moved to React. Then I mastered the MEAN stack by creating various REST APIs. With this knowledge of the Software Developement Lifecycle I created my own software freelancing business. I am proficient in SQL and Javascript and currently learning blockchain technology. I am a quick study, a hardworker and can adapt to any system or situation. Please do not contact me with unsolicited offers. If you need IT help or custom software for your business, feel free to email me.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Online dashboard for business management and layout creation
work.description: Business management tool that utilizes custom software to save, load and edit customer information, orders, and project tracking. Uses the LAMP stack, Linux, PHP, MySQL and Javascript

work.title: Racing Game
work.description: A webGL racing video game made with only two colors. Dynamic force calculations for friction and acceleration were utilized inside of Unity to make this online drifting game.

work.title: Rougelite Web Video Game
work.description: A small video game created in PICO-8. Using a modified version of the LUA programming language I was able to create random map generation, enemy AI and movement mechanics, a combat system and various enemies, all within 72 hours.
